items.text: **Change the size of text in Windows 10**

Change the size of text in Windows 10 using Display settings or use Magnifier.

In Windows: Select the Start Windows logo Start button button, then select Settings Gear-shaped Settings icon > Ease of Access > Display. To make just the text on your screen larger, adjust the slider under Make text bigger. To make everything larger, including images and apps, choose an option from the drop-down menu under Make everything bigger.

Use Magnifier: Magnifier zooms in on parts of your screen to make them easier to see. To open Magnifier, press the Windows logo key Windows logo Start button + Plus sign (+). While Magnifier is open, zoom in and out by pressing Windows logo key Windows logo Start button + Plus sign (+) and **Windows logo key **Windows logo Start button + Minus sign (-). To close Magnifier, press Windows logo key Windows logo Start button + Esc.
